# Accessing a list

    my @list = 1..10;

    say @list[0];    # 1
    say @list.[1];   # 2
    say @list[0,1];  # slice: 1, 2

    say @list.elems; # number of items      = 10
    say @list.end;   # number of last index = 9
    say @list[*-1];  # last item            = 10

http://doc.perl6.org/type/Whatever
